argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( f = F -> ( f shift M ) = ( F shift M ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_breq1d | |- ( f = F -> ( ( f shift M ) ~~> A <-> ( F shift M ) ~~> A ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_breq1 | |- ( f = F -> ( f ~~> A <-> F ~~> A ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_bibi12d | |- ( f = F -> ( ( ( f shift M ) ~~> A <-> f ~~> A ) <-> ( ( F shift M ) ~~> A <-> F ~~> A ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_imbi2d | |- ( f = F -> ( ( M e. ZZ -> ( ( f shift M ) ~~> A <-> f ~~> A ) ) <-> ( M e. ZZ -> ( ( F shift M ) ~~> A <-> F ~~> A ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_znegcl | |- ( M e. ZZ -> -u M e. ZZ ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( f shift M ) e. _V |
| 8 | 7 | #P_climshftlem | |- ( -u M e. ZZ -> ( ( f shift M ) ~~> A -> ( ( f shift M ) shift -u M ) ~~> A ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( ( f shift M ) ~~> A -> ( ( f shift M ) shift -u M ) ~~> A ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ZZ>= ` M ) = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( ( f shift M ) shift -u M ) e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( ( f shift M ) shift -u M ) e. _V ) |
| 13 |  | #P_vex | |- f e. _V |
| 14 | 13 | #P_a1i | |- ( M e. ZZ -> f e. _V ) |
| 15 |  | #P_id | |- ( M e. ZZ -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 16 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( M e. ZZ -> M e. CC ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eluzelcn | |- ( k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) -> k e. CC ) |
| 18 | 13 | #P_shftcan1 | |- ( ( M e. CC /\ k e. CC ) -> ( ( ( f shift M ) shift -u M ) ` k ) = ( f ` k ) ) |
| 19 | 16, 17, 18 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) -> ( ( ( f shift M ) shift -u M ) ` k ) = ( f ` k ) ) |
| 20 | 10, 12, 14, 15, 19 | #P_climeq | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( ( ( f shift M ) shift -u M ) ~~> A <-> f ~~> A ) ) |
| 21 | 9, 20 | #P_sylibd | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( ( f shift M ) ~~> A -> f ~~> A ) ) |
| 22 | 13 | #P_climshftlem | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( f ~~> A -> ( f shift M ) ~~> A ) ) |
| 23 | 21, 22 | #P_impbid | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( ( f shift M ) ~~> A <-> f ~~> A ) ) |
| 24 | 5, 23 | #P_vtoclg | |- ( F e. V -> ( M e. ZZ -> ( ( F shift M ) ~~> A <-> F ~~> A ) ) ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_impcom | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ F e. V ) -> ( ( F shift M ) ~~> A <-> F ~~> A ) ) |
